Articles.Content:
Hello all.

i have had ksp for a few months, I only played it a few times and gave up. However, I have recently got right into it and have learned a few tricks in the last few days.

i can land on the Mun and achieve stable circular orbits so far. I fully intend to explore the solar system in due course and hopefully some of you lovely people will help me along the way.

Per ardua ad Astra.

Hello Pascale, and welcome to the forum.

If you can orbit and land on Mun, the only major hurdle left is docking. Once you get that figured out, you'll be able to do anything that's possible in the game. Good luck, and feel free to ask questions.
